title: A Bay in the balance
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Barry Paine
brief_description: In 1972, the Victorian Government responded to a conservation campaign and further industrial development in Westernport was halted. A major scientific study was initiated to examine how the relatively undeveloped bay functions and what future plans should be.
description: In 1972, the Victorian Government responded to a conservation campaign and further industrial development in Westernport was halted. A major scientific study was initiated to examine how the relatively undeveloped bay functions and what future plans should be.
